https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/45KOJJGFxQIfAExXRcILZigPfbo.jpg It starts like this: a beach, a cliff, a pine tree forest, and a house made of stone. In the house, Virginia wakes up startled by a nightmare, and in the nightmare we can see her cousin Anabel with a deathly pale face and traces of blood around her lips. Darkness by Day
